column6: Hello! I'm VirtualCarolyn. Take a minute to introduce yourselves.
I am gaurav
Howdy, Gaurav!
While I may not tell how to develop the desired app directly, I can help/guide you planning its development.
I will share images to the whiteboard to help/guide you
Now I'll start an interactive dialogue.
What type of android app, you are planning to develop?
I want to develop a voice recorder app
Great, we will be planning to develop an audio recorder.
Should we get started?
yes
Spend some time to come up with your initial plan. Press "I'm ready" button when you think you are done.
which recorder api should I use ?
Correct, we need to create a new instance/object for recorder and choose a recorder api to do so.
but which one ?
But, it seems you have a question regarding recorder instance.
I can help you to decide the type of recorder api to be used and example code snippet to do it.
Do you know or decided on any recorder api that can be used?
no
Ok
Maybe this will help:
You can record audio using the MediaRecorder or AudioRecord APIs if supported by the device hardware
Which one you will like to choose?
i think first one mediarecorder
Ok, move on and decide other steps.
audio source will be MIC
Yes, we need to set an audio source on recorder object..
i will use mic
Move on and decide other steps.
Yes, we need to set an audio source on recorder object..
I am waiting for your response to start. Please ask for help if you are stuck.
i need to decide on audio encoder
Yes, we need to set an audio encoder on recorder object..
i am thinking which one to use
But, it seems you have a question regarding audio encoding.
I can help you to decide the type of audio encoding to be used and example code snippet to do it.
Do you know or decided on any audio encoding that can be used?
yes
Ok
Which codec you will use?
amr narrowband
I am waiting for your response to start. Please ask for help if you are stuck.
Which codec you will use?
amr narrowband
I don't know what that is.
Ok, move on.
please help
Yes, we need to set an output format type on recorder object..
i will use mpeg
Yes, we need to set an output format type on recorder object..
Move on and decide other steps.
i will decide on programming stuff now
i will start recorder using recorder.start()
Start audio recording
Move on and decide other steps.
and stop recorder using recorder.stop()
Start audio recording
Move on and decide other steps.
anything else help
We need to prepare recorder instance before starting it.
I am waiting for your response to start. Please ask for help if you are stuck.
ok how ?
Call recorder_obj.prepare() on the Recorder instance.
